Name: Trademark Counterfeiting
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to including violations of the penal law relating to trademark counterfeiting in the nuisance abatement law.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

    	Section 1.  Subdivision (m) of section 7-703 of the administrative code of the city of New York, is amended to read as follows:
    	(m) Any building, erection or place, including one-or two-family dwellings, wherein, within the period of one year prior to the commencement of an action under this chapter, there have occurred two or more violations on the part of the lessees, owners, operators, or occupants, of the provisions of sections 165.40, 165.45, 165.50, 165.71, 165.72, 165.73, 170.65, 170.70, and 175.10 of the penal law or section 415-a of the vehicle and traffic law.
    	ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately.

    	Referred to the Committee on Consumer Affairs.
